title: Official Project Start
description: MyLIT project officially started after conceptual discussions with Gemini. `lit-landing-page` repository created on GitHub. Initial GDD structure (v1) created on GitHub Wiki.

title: Website Setup
description: Created Next.js project in `lit-landing-page` repo. Configured Vercel deployment. Initialized shadcn/ui.

title: Visual Timeline Created
description: Developed the Changelog page (`/changelog`) with React component, reading data from JSON. Implemented 'Liquid Glass' style. Created local HTML tool for adding entries.
